channel.title: Scar Portable?
channel.description:
Hi, i was wondering if there is a way to make scar portable
i would like to use it in school, since at least one of my classes each day is in tech lab, only you cant install things to registry?
any ideas, just wondering

item.title: Scar Portable?
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

just download SCAR 3.13, use the “mobile” option in the installer to install it onto for example your memory stick or if u want u could install it on a pc in ur school or something, then it’ll load and save settings from/to a file rather than the registry

Read full topic
